definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: A gambler, making a bet of your soul with him alone.
sentences.chinese: 把自己灵魂押给他的赌徒。

sentences.english: Gamblers “invest” money in wagers on unknowable future events.
sentences.chinese: 而赌徒们是将金钱投资到自己不知前景的事物上。

sentences.english: Other compulsive bettors may be even less rational.
sentences.chinese: 其他赌徒可能更加不理性。

sentences.english: Other gamblers beat him black and blue since he lost but couldn't pay.
sentences.chinese: 他赌输了，又付不出钱，其它赌徒把他揍得遍体鳞伤。

sentences.english: Each gambler and punter has their own style of working .
sentences.chinese: 每个赌徒和玩家有自己的风格的工作。

sentences.english: He was notorious as a gambler and rake.
sentences.chinese: 他是声名狼藉的赌徒和浪荡子。

sentences.english: Win money from the occasional gambler, often losing money into.
sentences.chinese: 赌徒由间中嬴钱，变成了经常输钱。

sentences.english: The gamblers were cleaned out by the policemen.
The gambler trickcd them out of all their money.
sentences.chinese: 赌徒设了圈套赢了他们所有的钱。

sentences.english: At first, when the gambler is only occasionally as a recreational gambling.
sentences.chinese: 赌徒起初的时候只是作为娱乐才间中赌博的。

sentences.english: It's common knowledge that he's a compulsive gambler.
sentences.chinese: 大家知道，他是个嗜赌成癖的赌徒。

sentences.english: The gamesters will palm the dice and will cog.
sentences.chinese: 赌徒们藏骰子在手掌中并且要诈赌。

sentences.english: As stakes rise, gamblers are demanding an edge.
sentences.chinese: 随着赌注的升高，赌徒们也在想方设法求胜。

sentences.english: At least one punter was kicking himself for not paying attention to Paul.
sentences.chinese: 起码有一个赌徒会为忽视保罗后悔不迭。

sentences.english: The gambler sponged a cigarette from the man sitting next to him.
sentences.chinese: 那个赌徒向坐在他旁边的人讨支烟抽。

sentences.english: A: If you are a gambler, you have your ways to get tips.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是个赌徒，你总有办法弄到内部消息。

definition: to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
gambling get-together/game of cards, mahjong etc
